page.title: 10Community Playgroups,K.Lynn
page.content: Community playgroups are run by management committees,which have constitutions and are members of the Pre-school Playgroups Association.They have paid and volunteer helpers,who work on a rota system.There is a small charge but most costs are met by fund raising, which is organized by the committee. North Lynn has two community groups;one meets in the Community centre and the other in the YMCA.They both take 25 children and the operate 4 mornings per week.These groups have some children whom social services pay for,as they consider they have special needs. South Wootton has one community playgroup, which meets at the village hallfrom 9-11.30 daily.52 children attend.Most children attend twice a week when 3, and three times when 4.
